mapper.select: SELECT n.note_no AS noteNo, m.m_id AS memberId, n.m_no AS memberNo, n.m_target_no AS memberTargetNo, n.note_body AS noteBody, n.note_send_time AS noteSendTime, n.note_read_time AS noteReadTime, n.status_code AS statusCode, n.status_code_target AS statusCodeTarget FROM note AS n INNER JOIN member AS m ON n.m_no = m.m_no WHERE n.m_target_no = #{memberNo} AND (n.status_code = 'S010301' OR n.status_code = 'S010302') AND (n.status_code_target = 'S010301' OR n.status_code_target = 'S010302')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (m_no, m_target_no, note_body, status_code, status_code_target) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{memberTargetNo}, #{noteBody}, 'S010301', 'S010301')
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET note_read_time = NOW(), status_code = 'S010302', status_code_target = 'S010302' WHERE note_no = #{noteNo}
UPDATE note SET status_code = 'S010303' WHERE note_no = #{noteNo}
UPDATE note SET status_code_target = 'S010303' WHERE note_no = #{noteNo}
